Examples.ExampleDescription: This example creates a room using specified data
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended: This is a general example of creating a room.
Examples.ResultsPageText:
The room "{0}" has been created!
Room ID: {1}.

Examples.ExampleName: Creating a room with a template
Examples.ExampleDescription: This example creates a room from a template
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended:
This example demonstrates creating a DocuSign Room using a predefined template.
If you've created a template for your organization in either Rooms for Mortgage
or Rooms for Real Estate, you can create rooms based on this template using the Rooms API.
Examples.PageTitle: Creating a room with a template
Examples.ResultsPageHeader: Creating a room with a template
Examples.ResultsPageText:
The room "{0}" has been created!
Room ID: {1}.

Examples.ExampleDescription: This example exports data from a room
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended: This is an example of exporting data from a room.
Examples.ResultsPageHeader: Field data associated with a room

Examples.ExampleDescription: This example adds form to a room
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended: This is an example of adding form to a room.
Examples.ResultsPageHeader: The DocuSign form was successfully added to the room

Examples.ExampleDescription: This example returns rooms by filter
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended:
This example demonstrates how to return rooms that have had their field data,
updated within the time period between Start date and End date.
Examples.ResultsPageHeader: Rooms that have had their field data, updated within the time period between {0} and {1}

Examples.ExampleName: Creating an external form fill session
Examples.ExampleDescription: This is an example of creating external form fill session
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended:
This example demonstrates how to create an external form fill session using the Rooms API:
the result of this code example is the URL for the form fill session, which you can embed
in your integration or send to the user.
Examples.PageTitle: Create an external form fill session
Examples.ResultsPageHeader: URL for a new external form fill session
